1612070.name: Coloring Pixels - Mythology Pack
1612070.description:
Mythology Book

This Mythology Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image depicts different Ancient Mythology from various cultures!

Take a seat by the fire and visit the legends of old with this DLC!

Contents

The Mythologybook unlocks the following images:

  • David and Goliath - 45x44
  • Yeti - 46x43
  • Sword in the Stone - 58x106
  • Minotaur - 75x60
  • Mermaid - 85x95
  • The Headless Horseman - 90x90
  • The Lady in the Lake - 90x220
  • King Arthur - 100x80
  • Chinese Dragon - 110x50
  • Ganesh - 120x145
  • Hydra - 135x64
  • Thor - 135x210
  • Robin Hood - 135x230
  • Kraken - 155x130
  • Medusa - 177x170
  • St. George and the Dragon - 200x100
  • Poseidon - 200x200
  • Ra and Thoth - 205x233
  • Zeus - 243x243
  • Hades and Cerberus - 250x285
